page.title: 02MEREVALE EST. ARABLE FARMING
page.content:
There are 2,500 acres of land on the{Merevale Estate,}which are used for Arable Farming. The main crops grown are:
{Barley - 558 acres {Wheat - 744 acres {Rape - 261 acres {Oats - 88 acres {Grass - 796 acres {Peas - 58 acres {Other - 74 acres
Some{Wheat}goes to make flour, some for cattle feed and some exported. {Barley}is used for cattle feed and 'malting'. The{Rape}is sown between Wheat harvests and is used to make vegetable oil which is used in margerine and as cooking oil.
